results.title: [Impulses]
results.creator_credit: North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Peter Baylis
results.brief_description: The story of the technical and scientific means of communication: cable, radio and television. These three forms of communication are bridging the gulf of distance and bringing humans closer together.

results.title: [Images en negatif]
results.brief_description: An example of the use of negative film material to produce dramatic impact in film. The director, Eugene Deslaw, is one of the pioneers of the avant-garde cinema and in this film he explores the possibilities of negative photography. The result is a poem of imagination and beauty. (Awards: Diploma of Honour: Venice Film Festival, 1956)

results.title: [ILO Webster]
results.creator_credit: Toonder Studios, Bert Kroon and John van der Heulen
results.brief_description: Unless we all work together the great problems of over population and massive unemployment has little chance of being overcome. This animated film discusses the problems and suggests possible ways of tackling them.
